subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Alinghi, a Swiss team, will not have to face Larry Ellison’s American team in the June 23-July 4 final. BMW Oracle Racing came into the competition as one of the favorites.
snippet: Alinghi, a Swiss team, will not have to face Larry Ellison’s American team in the June 23-July 4 final. BMW Oracle Racing came into the competition as one of the favorites.
